title: Building a Real-Time Table Editor with Databricks Apps and Lakebase
summary: Learn how to build a real-time table editor using Databricks Apps and Lakebase, the new fully-managed Postgres OLTP database integrated with the Databricks platform.

title: End-to-End RAG Application with Source Retrieval Platform
summary: Comprehensive guide on building retrieval-augmented generation applications with Databricks Apps, covering architecture patterns and implementation strategies.

title: Building Data Applications with Databricks Apps
summary: An introduction to building data applications using Databricks Apps, exploring frameworks, development patterns, and best practices.

title: Setting up your development environment for Databricks Apps
summary: Opinionated guide to setting up a great developer experience for Databricks Apps with local IDE development, OAuth authentication, and efficient deployment workflows.

title: Building Interactive Web Applications with Databricks Connect
summary: Walk through a modern 3-tier architecture built with React frontend, FastAPI backend, and Databricks Serverless Compute via Databricks Connect.

title: Build Databricks Apps in 5 Minutes!
summary: Quick video tutorial teaching how to build your first Databricks App in less than 5 minutes using popular frameworks and serverless deployment.

title: Databricks Apps Deep Dive Tutorial
summary: Comprehensive video guide covering Databricks Apps architecture, deployment patterns, and advanced features.

title: Exploring Code With Databricks Apps
summary: Build a Databricks App for understanding complex code bases using LLMs, vector databases, and code analysis tools to explore C code like SQLite.

title: Implement fine-grained permissions for Databricks Apps with on-behalf-of-user authorization
summary: Learn how to leverage on-behalf-of-user (OBO) authorization to implement fine-grained permissions in Databricks Apps using Unity Catalog.

title: Building an Inpainting App Using Hugging Face, Databricks Model Serving, and Databricks Apps
summary: Comprehensive guide to building an image inpainting application using Hugging Face Diffusers, MLflow, Databricks Model Serving, and Databricks Apps.

title: Building Databricks Apps with React and Mosaic AI Agents for Enterprise Chat Solutions
summary: Technical implementation of a Databricks-hosted chatbot combining React frontend with Mosaic AI Agent Framework for manufacturing operations management.

title: Official Databricks Apps Documentation
summary: Official documentation for Databricks Apps covering setup, development, deployment, and best practices for building secure data and AI applications.

title: Databricks Apps GitHub Examples Repository
summary: Collection of example applications demonstrating various use cases and patterns for Databricks Apps including authentication, data visualization, and AI integration.

title: The Full Stack of Innovation: Building Data and AI Products With Databricks Apps
summary: Deep-dive technical session from Data + AI Summit covering full-stack development of Databricks Apps including frameworks, testing, CI/CD, and monitoring.

title: Building Data Visualization Apps with Streamlit and Databricks SQL
summary: Quick example of building a data visualization app in almost pure Python using Streamlit and Databricks SQL endpoints.

title: Building a Data Labeling App with Python, Dash, and Databricks Lakehouse
summary: Writing a data labeling application on top of the Databricks Lakehouse platform with Python and Dash for machine learning workflows.

title: Building an Image Classification App with Databricks Connect V2 and Dash
summary: Detailed guide on setting up and building an image classification app with Databricks Connect V2 (based on Spark Connect) and the Dash framework.
